      Books the specified number of seats for the specified customer in the specified mode.

      Books the specified seats for the specified customer.
      boolean DataAccess.cancelBookings(List<Booking> bookings)
      Cancel the specified bookings.
      void DataAccess.close()
      Closes this data access object.
      List<Integer> DataAccess.getAvailableSeats(boolean stable)
      Returns the available seats in the specified mode.
      List<Booking> DataAccess.getBookings(String customer)
      Returns the current bookings of the specified customer.
      List<Float> DataAccess.getPriceList()
      Returns the price list.
      boolean DataAccess.initDataStore(int seatCount, List<Float> priceList)
      Initializes the data store according to the specified number of seats and the specified price list.
      Constructors in model that throw DataAccessException 
      Constructor and Description
      DataAccess(String url, String login, String password)
      Creates a new DataAccess object that interacts with the specified data store, using the specified login and the specified password.
